content: over the 1st st and off the needle 4 slip the 1st st to right needle purl-wise 5 on left needle k2tog there are now 2 sts on right needle 6 on right needle lift the right st over the left and off the needle 7 slip the st on right needle to the left needle repeat row 1-7 to last stitch cut yarn and pull through last stitch note i found that if i kept the stitches fairly loose that made it easier to slip the stitches over the needle finishing lightly block and weave in ends © marilyn prince designs please respect my copyright and do not resell publish or distribute this pattern however you are free to use the final items you make from the pattern for charity gifting or selling in limited numbers
